name: Kubo
description:
Kubo is a digital agency specialized in the development of mobile applications and platforms, in 10 years we have developed more than 150 projects for companies and ventures in the region.
Our main focus is the user experience the development of robust but simple digital products, developed with native technologies or native multiplatform, always trying to use the best technology according to each project.
We have developed projects of:
* Transactional platforms
* Music and sports applications.
* UBER-type service platforms
* Service platforms
* Loyalty platforms
* Specialized E-commerce
* Games and entertainment
READ MORE...
